Transform WL data to 15-min intervals to smooth
```{r}
# Aggregate the water level data into 15-minute intervals
aggregate_to_15min <- function(df, time_col, level_col) {
  # Calculate the number of complete groups of 3
  complete_rows <- (nrow(df) %/% 3) * 3
  
  # Filter out any incomplete group
  df <- df[1:complete_rows, ]
  
  df_15min <- df %>%
    dplyr::mutate(group = rep(1:(n()/3), each = 3)) %>%
    dplyr::group_by(group) %>%
    dplyr::summarize(
      !!time_col := first(!!sym(time_col)),                # Use the first timestamp in each group
      !!level_col := mean(!!sym(level_col))               # Take the average of the three values
    ) %>%
    dplyr::select(-group)                                  # Drop the 'group' column
  
  return(df_15min)
}

# Hospital
hos_15min <- aggregate_to_15min(hospital_data, "DateTime", "Depth.ft")
hos_depth_15min <- hos_15min$Depth.ft
datetime_hos_15min <- as.POSIXct(hos_15min$DateTime, format = "%m/%d/%y %H:%M")

# Garner
```

```{r}
# get average outflow for non-restrictive ponds
get_avg_outflow_nonres <- function(elevation, H_0, L_w) {
  # initialize outflow_1 and outflow_2 with proper lengths
  outflow_1 <- numeric(length(elevation))
  outflow_2 <- numeric(length(elevation))
  # create a vector to store the average outflow
  avg_outflow <- numeric(length(elevation))
  for (i in 1:(length(elevation)-1)) {
    outflow_1[i+1] <- outflow_2[i]
    
    if (elevation[i] < H_0) {
      outflow_2[i+1] <- 0
    }
    else {
      outflow_2[i+1] <- 3.0888*L_w*((elevation[i]-H_0)^(3/2))
    }
  avg_outflow[i+1] <- (outflow_1[i+1] + outflow_2[i+1])/2  
  }
  return(avg_outflow)
}
avg_outflow_bax_test <- get_avg_outflow_nonres(depth_ft_bax, 12/12, 2.25)
```

```{r}
# Calculates inflow using values from actual water level measurements

# time delta used in Puls caluclations

#time_delta <- time_delta[1] # constant
time_delta <- 300

# average inflow 
# Garner
avg_inflow_gar <- ((storage_2_gar-storage_1_gar)/time_delta)+((outflow_2_gar+outflow_1_gar)/2)
# water level plus 0.5 inch
avg_inflow_gar_plus0.5 <- ((storage_2_gar_plus0.5-storage_1_gar_plus0.5)/time_delta)+((outflow_2_gar_plus0.5+outflow_1_gar_plus0.5)/2)
# water level minus 0.5 inch
```

```{r}
# average inflow
```

```{r}
# function to plot inflow and outflow for each site at a specific index range
plot_outflow_error <- function(outflow_2_pond, outflow_2_pond_plus1, outflow_2_pond_minus0.5, outflow_2_pond_noise, index_start, index_end, title) {
  # plot inflow and outflow for each site
  plot(outflow_2_pond[index_start:index_end], type = "l", col = "black", xlab = "Time Elapsed (5 min)", ylab = "Flow (cfs)", main = title, lwd = 1, ylim=c(0, max(outflow_2_pond_plus1[index_start:index_end])))
  lines(outflow_2_pond_plus1[index_start:index_end], col = "red", lwd = 1)
  lines(outflow_2_pond_minus0.5[index_start:index_end], col = "gold", lwd = 1)
  lines(outflow_2_pond_noise[index_start:index_end], col = "lightblue", lwd = 1)
  legend("topright", legend = c("Outflow", "Outflow Plus 1in", "Outflow Minus 1in", "Outflow with Noise"), col = c("black", "red", "gold", "lightblue"), lty = 1, lwd = 2)
  grid()
}
```

```{r}
# function to plot inflow and outflow for each site at a specific index range
plot_inflow_error <- function(avg_inflow_pond, avg_inflow_pond_plus1, avg_inflow_pond_minus0.5, avg_inflow_pond_noise, index_start, index_end, title) {
  # plot inflow and outflow for each site
  plot(avg_inflow_pond[index_start:index_end], type = "l", col = "gray", xlab = "Time Elapsed (5 min)", ylab = "Flow (cfs)", main = title, lwd = 1, ylim=c(-5, max(avg_inflow_pond_plus1[index_start:index_end])), xaxt='n')
  lines(avg_inflow_pond_plus1[index_start:index_end], col = "purple", lwd = 1)
  lines(avg_inflow_pond_minus0.5[index_start:index_end], col = "salmon", lwd = 1)
  lines(avg_inflow_pond_noise[index_start:index_end], col = "seagreen", lwd = 1)
  legend("topright", legend = c("Inflow", "Inflow Plus 1in", "Inflow Minus 1in", "Inflow with Noise"), col = c("gray", "purple", "salmon", "seagreen"), lty = 1, lwd = 2)
  grid()
  get_dates <- function(datetime) {
    d = strsplit(datetime,' ')[[1]][1]
    d = strsplit(d,'/')[[1]]
    return(paste(d[1], '/', d[2], sep=""))
  }
  
  dates = lapply(datetime_hos[27256:27656],get_dates)
  idx_change=c()
  last_d = 0
  for (i in 1:length(dates)) {
    if (dates[[i]] != last_d) {
      idx_change = append(idx_change, i)
      last_d = dates[i]
    }
  }
    
  axis(1,at=idx_change,labels=dates[idx_change])
}
```

```{r}
  }
```

Plot inflow and outflow for each pond
```{r}
# Write function to plot the inflow, outflow, error inflow, and error outflow for each pond
plot_inflow_outflow <- function(pond_dates, pond_df, pond_error_df, pond_name, pond_color, error_color){
  plot(pond_df$Inflow.cfs, type = "l", lwd = 2, col = pond_color, xlab = "Date", ylab = "Flow (cfs)", xaxt='n', main = paste(pond_name, "Inflow/Outflow"))
  lines(pond_error_df$Inflow.cfs, col = error_color, lwd = 2)
  lines(pond_df$Outflow.cfs, col = "black", lwd = 2)
  lines(pond_error_df$Outflow.cfs, col = "gray", lwd = 2)
  # Add legend to plot
  legend("topright", legend = c("Inflow", "Error Inflow", "Outflow", "Error Outflow"), col = c(pond_color, error_color, "black", "gray"), lty = 1)
  grid()
  
  get_dates <- function(datetime) {
  d = strsplit(datetime,' ')[[1]][1]
  d = strsplit(d,'/')[[1]]
  return(paste(d[1], '/', d[2], sep=""))
  }
  
  dates = lapply(pond_dates,get_dates)
  idx_change=c()
  last_d = 0
  for (i in 1:length(dates)) {
    if (dates[[i]] != last_d) {
      idx_change = append(idx_change, i)
      last_d = dates[i]
    }
  }
    
  axis(1,at=idx_change,labels=dates[idx_change])
}
```

Plot showing effects of smoothing
```{r}
# function to plot inflow and outflow for each site at a specific index range
plot_inflow_smoothing <- function(avg_inflow_raw, avg_inflow_smooth, avg_inflow_15min, avg_outflow_raw, avg_outflow_smooth, avg_outflow_15min, pond_datetime, pond_datetime_15min, index_start, index_end, index_start_15min, index_end_15min, title) {
  # plot inflow and outflow for each site
  plot(pond_datetime[index_start:index_end], avg_inflow_raw[index_start:index_end], type = "l", col = "dodgerblue4", xlab = "Date", ylab = "Flow (cfs)", main = title, lwd = 1, ylim=c(-1, max(avg_inflow_raw[index_start:index_end])), xaxt='n')
  lines(pond_datetime[index_start:index_end], avg_inflow_smooth[index_start:index_end], col = "dodgerblue", lwd = 1)
  lines(pond_datetime_15min[index_start_15min:index_end_15min], avg_inflow_15min[index_start_15min:index_end_15min], col = "cadetblue1", lwd = 1)
  lines(pond_datetime[index_start:index_end], avg_outflow_raw[index_start:index_end], col = "palegreen4", lwd = 1)
  lines(pond_datetime[index_start:index_end], avg_outflow_smooth[index_start:index_end], col = "palegreen3", lwd = 1)
  lines(pond_datetime_15min[index_start_15min:index_end_15min], avg_outflow_15min[index_start_15min:index_end_15min], col = "palegreen", lwd = 1)
  legend("topright", legend = c("Inflow Raw", "Inflow Smoothed", "Inflow 15 Min", "Outflow Raw", "Outflow Smoothed", "Outflow 15 Min"), col = c("dodgerblue4", "dodgerblue", "cadetblue1", "palegreen4", "palegreen3", "palegreen"), lty = 1, lwd = 2)
  grid()
    get_dates <- function(datetime) {
    d = strsplit(datetime,' ')[[1]][1]
    d = strsplit(d,'/')[[1]]
    return(paste(d[1], '/', d[2], sep=""))
  }

  dates = lapply(hospital_data$DateTime[27256:27656],get_dates)
  idx_change=c()
  last_d = 0
  for (i in 1:length(dates)) {
    if (dates[[i]] != last_d) {
      idx_change = append(idx_change, i)
      last_d = dates[i]
    }
  }

  axis(1,at=idx_change,labels=dates[idx_change])
}
```

Attenuation Function
```{r}
get_attenuation <- function(inflow, outflow, index_start, index_end) {
  max_inflow <- max(inflow[index_start:index_end])
  max_outflow <- max(outflow[index_start:index_end])
  #return(max_inflow - max_outflow)
  return(((max_inflow-max_outflow)/max_inflow)*100)
}
```
